QuestData.Title: Azoran Must Die
QuestData.Description: You won't have much time before the Legion is aware of your presence on the ship.$b$bWhen the alarm is raised, countless Burning Legion forces will attempt to board the ship through this portal.$b$bI will not let them succeed.$b$bI will guard this portal from enemy reinforcements until you return. It is up to you to slay Azoran and lay waste to his ship.$b$bWe don't have much time... you must attack swiftly and without mercy.
QuestData.RewardText: With Azoran slain, the Legion has been dealt a crippling blow that they will not soon recover from.$b$bYou have my respect, $n.
